name: PGA Tour 96
overview: Here is your chance to experience the fairways and greens you've always dreamed of. Walk the 18th on the TPC at Sawgrass with the best on the PGA TOUR, then pass the field by as you march on to win it all! - Look at the numbers, 5 TPC courses, 5 new tournaments, and 3 different play modes: Practice, Skins, and Tournament. - If you win a Tournament, you win trophies and prize money! - Updated roster includes 8 featured PGA TOUR pros. - Awesome new state-of-the-art graphics
